name: basiq-sdk-nodejs
description: Node.js SDK Package for Basiq's API

scripts.build: ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js && ./node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output dist/index.js -- dist/index.js && cp dist/index.js index.js && cp dist/index.js.map index.js.map

author: Basiq.io
